articles.description: Travis has launched a new initiative to make events safer less than a month after his response to the November tragedy sparked renewed backlash.

articles.title: 'Bones' actor Heath Freeman died from overdose of several drugs - Page Six
articles.description: Freeman, who also appeared on “NCIS,” died in November at age 41. The Travis County Medical Examiner’s report revealed he was found unresponsive in his bed.
articles.content:
Heath Freeman’s cause of death has been revealed.
The “Bones” actor died from an overdose of multiple opioids and narcotics, TMZ reported Wednesday.
